_header: Trusty seldom to their friends unjust
_description: A Punctuation Poem — one stanza rhyme royal

CamPem307.First Lines:
Trusty seldom to ther ffrendys vniustGlade for to helpe ne no
                    Cristen creator…
CamPem307.Last Lines:
…Wher nede is gewyng nether rewarde ne ffeeVnresonably Thus
                    leve prestys parde
CamPem307.Note: Added by a second later hand, third copy on page.
